body:
Adding the proposed flags will make vanity import checking useless. People
will begin to override the check for "good" reasons. If an enforcement can
be easily circumvented, then that enforcement is no use at all. This is
similar to the question of adding a flag to make unused variable/import a
warning rather than an error, and the answer is the same: no.

Forking and vendering needs to update the import paths and import comments,
and that's not a problem at all.
